weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain. I'm white and fluffy, and cold to touch. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am often seen in winter.
⛄ You can make snowballs out of me.
🌨️ I am made of frozen water.

weather.question: I am hot and bright, and I appear in the day. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am in the sky.
😎 You need sunglasses when I'm out.
🔥 I give off heat and light.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I have many colors. You can only see me when the sun is out. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I look like a colorful arch.
💧 I need water and sunlight to appear.
🔴 I have red, orange, yellow, green, blue, indigo, and violet.

weather.question: I am strong and powerful. I can blow down trees and make it hard to walk. What am I?

hints.text: 💨 I am moving air.
🍃 Sometimes I whisper, sometimes I roar.
🪁 Kites need me to fly.

weather.question: I am white and puffy. I float in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I am made of water droplets.
🐑 I can look like sheep or other animals.
☔ I can block the sun.

weather.question: I rumble and flash, I can be scary. I often come with rain. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am electricity in the sky.
💥 I make a loud noise.
🔦 I light up the sky.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky, but I am frozen solid. I can be small or large, and I can hurt if I hit you. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 I am a form of precipitation.
🤕 It's best to stay inside when I'm falling.
⚾ I can be as small as a pea or as big as a baseball!

weather.question: I am a hot, dry wind. I often carry dust and sand. I can make the air feel very uncomfortable. What am I?

hints.text: 🏜️ I am common in desert areas.
🥵 I can cause heat waves.
🌵 I can damage plants.

weather.question: I am a swirling storm with strong winds and heavy rain. I form over warm ocean water. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I have an eye in the middle.
🌊 I can cause floods and damage to buildings.
🧭 People often use weather satellites to track my movement.

weather.question: I am a period of unusually hot weather that lasts for several days or weeks. I can be dangerous for people and animals. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I am associated with high temperatures.
💧 Staying hydrated is very important during me.
🥵 I can cause the ground to dry up and crack.

ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I can be found on land and sometimes near the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥗 I like to eat lettuce.
🐌 I am a type of gastropod.

ocean.question: I am big and blue and full of water. Fish live in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I cover most of the Earth.
🚢 Boats sail on me.
🐳 Whales live in me.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I can squeeze through small spaces.
🎨 I can change color to hide.
⚫ I can squirt ink.

ocean.question: I am a very large animal in the sea and breathe air. What am I?

hints.text: 🎶 Some of my kind sing songs.
💦 I have a blowhole.
🐳 I'm a mammal.

ocean.question: I am a fish with a long, pointed bill that looks like a sword. What am I?

hints.text: ⚔️ I use my bill to hunt.
🐟 I am a popular seafood.
🛥️ Boats sometimes hunt me.

ocean.question: I am a colorful underwater structure formed by colonies of tiny animals and providing a habitat for many fish. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 Many colorful animals live here.
🤿 Divers like to explore me.
🧱 I am built by tiny animals.

ocean.question: I am the rise and fall of sea levels caused by the gravitational forces of the moon and the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ⬆️ I rise and fall twice a day.
🌕 The moon pulls on me.
🌊 I can make waves bigger.

ocean.question: I am a warm and swift Atlantic ocean current that originates in the Gulf of Mexico and flows up the eastern coastline of the United States and towards Northwest Europe. What am I?

hints.text: 🌍 I start in the Gulf of Mexico.
🌡️ I am a warm current.
➡️ I flow up the eastern coast of the United States.

ocean.question: I am the deepest part of the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 It's very dark down here.
🔱 No sunlight reaches me.
🌋 It's a trench located in the western Pacific Ocean.

ocean.question: I am a large piece of freshwater ice that has broken off a glacier or ice sheet and is floating freely in open water. What am I?

hints.text: 🧊 Only a small part of me is visible above the water.
🚢 I can be very dangerous to ships.
📉 I am melting due to global warming.
